channel.title: Adding Special Crowns

item.title: Adding Special Crowns
item.dc:creator: @Pixel_95 Pixel_95
item.description:
@Pixel_95 wrote:

hey guys thats my first tut that make u to add special crown to ur self

ok first search in ur player.java for :

PlayerRights == 2then it should be like :

if(playerRights == 2){ str.writeByte(2); }else if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0){ str.writeByte(7); }else if(playerRights != 2){ str.writeByte(playerRights);or somthin like it

then before the

if(playerRights == 2){add this :

if(playerRights == 3){ if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NameHere")){ str.writeByte(5); }else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NameHere")){ str.writeByte(8); }else str.writeByte(6); }elseso it should be like :

if(playerRights == 3){ if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NameHere")){ str.writeByte(5); }else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NameHere")){ str.writeByte(8); }else str.writeByte(6); }else if(playerRights == 2){ str.writeByte(2); }else if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0){ str.writeByte(7); }else if(playerRights != 2){ str.writeByte(playerRights); }or somthin like it…

now open ur client.java and search for :

PlayerRights == 2you’ll see somthin like

[code] else if (playerRights == 2)
out.write(2);
else if (playerRights == 1)
out.write(1);
else if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0)
out.write(7);

            else
                out.write(playerRights);[/code]before the:

else if (playerRights == 2)add this :

if(playerRights == 3){ if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NameHere")){ out.write(5); }else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NameHere")){ out.write(8); }else out.write(6); }so it should be somthin like :

[code]if(playerRights == 3){
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NameHere”)){
out.write(5);
}else
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“NameHere”)){
out.write(8);
}else
out.write(6);
}

            else if (playerRights == 2)
                out.write(2);
            else if (playerRights == 1)
                out.write(1);
            else if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0)
                out.write(7);
            
            else[/code]or somthin like it....

Final Result:

P.SAll the names above were rights 3 but 2 of em was in if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NameHere")){P.SMake sure that the same number in (Number); match the 1 on player.java

ok thats my first tut hope u like it
